original_title: Dark Tranquility - Moment In Concert: Live From Stora Teatern
overview: Dark Tranquillity, one of Gothenburg’s signature melodeath bands, jumped on the live-stream wagon by offering a video stream of the live world premiere of their latest album “Moment” played in its entirety after only one day from the official album release day. This event was broadcast on Saturday, November 21st and it was shot at the Stora Teatern in Gothenburg, Sweden.
title: Dark Tranquility - Moment In Concert: Live From Stora Teatern
